Githyanki Dwarven Resilience Feature You have advantage on saving throws against Poison, and you have resistance against Poison damage. Dwarf Duergar Battleaxe Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Battleaxes.
